newsitem.title: USA: Evergreen Media redeems prfrd shares.
newsitem.headline: Evergreen Media redeems prfrd shares.

text.p: Evergreen Media Corp said on Thursday it has completed the redemption of its outstanding $3.00 convertible exchangeable preferred stock.

Evergreen Media, a radio broadcasting company, said 1,608,297 of the preferred shares were converted into a total of 5,025,916 shares of Evergreen's class A common stock at a rate of 3.125 per share of preferred stock surrendered.
Evergreen Media said 1,703 shares of preferred stock were redeemed at $52.70 per share.
The company said it now has 39.0 million shares of class A common stock outstanding.
